title: Lord, grant thy blessing here today

verses.text: Lord, grant thy blessing here today; Oh! give thy people joy and peace; The tokens of thy love display, And favor that shall never cease.
We seek thy truth which Jesus bought; His path of light we long to tread; Here be his holy doctrine taught, And here their purest influence shed.
May faith, and hope, and love, abound; Our sins and errors be forgiven; And we, from day to day, be found Children of God and heirs of Heaven.
